editorialSummary.text: Polished rooms & suites in a luxe hotel with 7 restaurants, plus a pool, a gym & a spa.

text.text: My experience at ITC Royal Bengal was nothing short of exceptional. The moment I stepped into the grand lobby, I was awestruck by its majestic decor and welcoming ambiance. The room was spacious, elegant, and offered stunning views of the city. Every detail, from the plush bedding to the luxurious bathroom amenities, reflected comfort and class. The food was a true highlight—especially the dinner at Royal Vega, which served authentic Indian flavors with royal finesse. The staff was courteous, attentive, and always eager to help. I also loved the serene pool area and the well-equipped fitness center. Overall, it was a perfect blend of luxury, relaxation, and impeccable service.

text.text:
Stayed here recently. A very good experience! Grand and opulent property. The decor is some kind of fancy  blend of heritage and modern luxury, with a lot details at every turn.

The staff was warm and welcoming, always ready to assist with a smile. Room was spacious, elegantly furnished, and offered beautiful views of the city. The comfort of the bed and the luxurious bathroom amenities made for a truly relaxing stay.

Dining at ITC Royal Bengal was a culinary delight. The breakfast buffet at Grand Market Pavilion featured a wide array of local and international dishes, all beautifully presented and delicious. The dining staff was attentive and ensured I had everything I needed.

The property’s spa and pool were perfect for unwinding.

Whether traveling for business or leisure, this hotel is a gem in the heart of Kolkata. highly recommended

text.text:
My recent stay at the ITC Royal Bengal was truly majestic. From the moment you arrive, the hotel exudes an aura of glory.
As night falls, the hotel's lights transform it into a breathtaking spectacle, illuminating its majestic architecture. It's a view that truly captivates.
The expansive breakfast spread each morning was a culinary delight, offering an incredible variety of delicious options.
Check-in and check-out were seamless and efficient, and their team was incredibly responsive over email, a testament to their excellent service.
The rooms were wonderfully large and inviting, but the true highlight was the supreme bathroom. It was a stunning and luxurious space, truly the cynosure of the room.
The ITC Royal Bengal offers an unforgettable experience of luxury and comfort, blending traditional charm with modern convenience. Highly recommended for a regal retreat.

text.text: It was an absolutely amazing experience, reminiscent of a third visit. The staff, the ambiance, and all the amenities in the hotel were very pleasant. From the early check-in to the late check-out, the staff's conduct and everything else were truly impeccable. A particularly wonderful event occurred during the breakfast buffet, which was already delightful. The head chef of the hotel, Mr. Ranvijay Singh, personally approached to gather feedback, and upon learning that I hail from the same city as his sister, he offered a token of affection and a gift: a delicious, freshly baked fruit cake, which I thoroughly enjoyed on my flight. I would like to extend my gratitude to him for such a thoughtful gesture towards his guests, and I will certainly be booking with ITC again.

text.text:
The Oberoi Grand, Kolkata – A Classic Experience

My stay at The Oberoi Grand was truly memorable. The hotel beautifully blends old-world charm with modern luxury. From the grand colonial architecture to the warm and professional service, everything felt top-class.

The rooms are spacious, very clean, and well-maintained. The food at the restaurants was delicious, especially the breakfast buffet with so many fresh options. The staff are polite, always ready to help, and they really make you feel welcome.

The central location is another big plus—perfect for exploring Kolkata. The pool area and greenery inside the property offer a peaceful escape from the busy city.

It’s a bit on the expensive side, but worth it for the comfort, quality, and hospitality you receive.

text.text:
Our recent stay at Taj Bengal, Kolkata, was truly memorable. The hotel’s ambience and serenity make it a perfect retreat in the heart of the city. True to the TAJ name, the hospitality was warm, thoughtful, and made us feel genuinely cared for.

A special thank you to Front Desk Executive Monolina, who made our stay extra special by arranging an upgrade and surprising us with a lovely cake — a thoughtful gesture that meant a lot to both of us.

We would also like to appreciate Rajesh from Housekeeping for keeping our room spotless and comfortable, and Leonard at Sonargaon for his courteous and attentive service, which made our dining experience wonderful.

We look forward to visiting Taj Bengal again soon for another delightful stay.

— Mayank & Charu

text.text: From the Moment we entered the property, We felt that We are in a fairy tale. After extremely smooth check in process our Concearge Mr. Sanjib walked us to our Room and on the way he informed us everything about Taj Bengal and it's history. He also guided us with all multicusine restaurants in the property and made sure that all our table reservations are done for both Lunch and Dinner. The Club Room was superb with Bathtub that we had specifically requested and the View from Room was awesome too. Mr. Vinod from Room Service accommodated all our requests properly. Room was neat and Clean. The food was delicious in both the restaurants Sonargaon and The chinosire. Swimming pool was well maintained and lifeguards were always making sure that everything is perfect. We totally enjoyed our stay at Taj Bengal and would definitely come back.

text.text:
Classic luxury with timeless charm. Taj Bengal is known for its warm hospitality and traditional elegance.

✔️ Décor: Clay statues & heritage art throughout the hotel—unchanged since its inception, still stunning.
✔️ Lobby & Entrance: Beautifully maintained with fresh floral décor and live instrumental music—my niece loved their sweet gesture of playing a song for her.
✔️ Rooms: Spacious with a vintage touch, though sofa seat covers and cushions near windows are stained & could use updating.

▸ Food Highlights:

◎ Sonargaon – rich North Indian cuisine; do not miss the kali dal makhani.

◎ Chinoiserie – subtle, authentic Chinese; loved the soy sauce green beans starter & rose petal ice cream.

◎ Souk – excellent Lebanese. B’stilla au Lait is a must-try dessert.

◎ The Hub Café – go for their hot brownie with ice cream.

A luxurious stay with soulful touches.

text.text:
I visited Taj for 2 nights last week. To be honest it is a pale shadow of what Taj brand use to be. To start with I must complement Abhijeet who made our stay worth while with all the help.
Firstly, we got a room which were not renovated but still had the heritage feeling to it. Deal breaker was the washroom, the toilet seat was soo old and dirty with stains and the shower was just taking it's last breath. We were so disappointed that we had to ask for a room change and I must say it was promptly done.
The staff was always courteous and  keen to help.
Next day we went for breakfast buffet, and I must say it had nothing Taj about it. The spread wasn't that great and some of the stuff they made didn't tingle my tastebuds either. That was the most disappointing thing of our stay.
I must say at the cost of repetition the staff ( esp Mr Abhijeet) was truly Taj like and offered great help.
My feedback would be to enhance the buffet spreads and check quality control for the taste of cuisine. Also I see that renovation is in progress so I presume toilets and showers will get better after that.
I really didn't find it my moneys worth this time but hopefully they will improve. I live abroad and I proudly advertise Taj properties as premium esp for food.
Hopefully this helps.

text.text: Experience of Hyatt Kolkata was like body with soul. Small yet important missed at the front desk like wrong update of email ID, false confirmation by front desk about updating the GST details. Ultimately it took 30 minutes while checking out due to getting corrections of email, GST, membership number etc. Be prepared to miss breakfast if you are checking out during morning hours. They kept only one desk operational even at the peak time of 8:00 to 8:30 am. No one listened to the request of getting packed breakfast addes to high degree of discomfort. Lot more to done to correct the casual working of front desk.

text.text:
I have had the pleasure of staying at ITC Sonar for over 10 years and I can confidently say that this property consistently surpasses expectations and sets the gold standard for luxury hospitality. Each visit reaffirms why I keep coming back, and I am continually impressed by the property's unwavering commitment to excellence.

From the moment you step into the front desk, the warm and attentive staff make you feel like a valued guest. Their professionalism, genuine hospitality, and meticulous attention to detail create an inviting atmosphere that immediately puts you at ease.

Stay here is an experience in itself.
Kudos to the Staff & Management.

text.text:
Unacceptable Stay – Senior Management Must Intervene

This was one of the most stressful hotel experiences I have ever had.

Despite pre-booking, I was told upon arrival that no rooms were available. Instead, I was pushed toward their “next-door property” which does not integrate with Booking.com, cannot charge the same card, and insisted on a different card or cash. This setup felt extremely questionable and gives the impression the hotel is avoiding its Booking.com commitments.

At midnight, loud music started from one of the rooms. I complained at 12:20 am. Shockingly, the staff spent over three hours “trying to find the room.” Only at 3:45 am was a room change finally offered after I raised my voice. What’s worse, the manager Kaushiki never once came to address the issue or even offer an apology. For three hours of disruption and stress, her absence and lack of responsibility were unacceptable.

The problems didn’t stop there. At breakfast, there was a 25-minute queue while staff stood distracted on their phones. Only after guests made noise were we redirected to another restaurant. Later, my new room access was locked because the night-shift staff forgot to update the system.

When I raised concerns, duty manager Mohitri attempted to “calm me down” by sharing irrelevant personal stories about her own divorce even wrongly assuming I was divorced. As a solo woman traveler, this was not only unprofessional but also extremely uncomfortable.

This property is far below expected standards. I have stayed at Hyatt and experienced nothing like this – they value professionalism and accountability, which was completely missing here.

To the senior management team: Please take ownership and review the conduct of your managers and staff. This level of negligence, insensitivity, and lack of basic hospitality is unacceptable. I expect to be contacted directly about this matter.

text.text: A luxurious and peaceful stay in the heart of the city. The hotel boasts elegant rooms, excellent dining options, and lush green surroundings. Staff are courteous and service is top-notch. Slightly pricey, but perfect for a premium experience.

text.text:
It has been a long time since I have experiences a staff as friendly and helpful as that of the ITC Sonar.  The resort is clean, fresh and very welcoming.  I enjoyed the food and the service very much.  Additionally, I would like to draw attention to one employee.  Each evening as I would return from work, I would quickly stop by the bar to order a drink to be delivered to the smoking lounge where I would relax with a cigar.  After only one day, Rick fully understood my routine and would always prepare the most delicious Old Fashioned I have had in quite some time.  Rick would see that my drink was delivered and that the staff would check on me for any refills.  Rick stands out to me as a great employee who is focused on the satisfaction of those he serves.  He takes great pride in his mixology as well.
Thank you all - - I hope to see you all again soon!

The hotel is situated in the middle of residences, so it comes as a surprise when you reach it. Me and my family spent three nights here and we found the experience to be very pleasant.
The rooms are not very big but are designed very well. The bathroom was very nicely designed and had ample space in the shower so that one does not bang into walls.
The staff was very helpful and looked after us ver well.
I enjoyed my stay here and would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to stay in the main area of Kolkata with easy access to the malls and Park Street.

I had a fantastic experience during my stay at the Hyatt Centric. From check-in to check-out, everything was seamless. The staff were incredibly friendly and professional, making me feel welcome right away.

My room was spotless, stylish, and very comfortable. I appreciated the thoughtful touches and modern amenities, which made my solo stay both relaxing and enjoyable. The bed was especially comfortable, and the quiet atmosphere allowed me to rest well.

The location was perfect—close to everything I needed, with great access to local restaurants, shops, and attractions. I also enjoyed the on-site dining options, which offered great food and a pleasant ambiance.

Overall, Hyatt Centric provided a wonderful stay. I’d gladly return..

This hotel boasts one of the best locations in Kolkata and truly exceeded my expectations during my stay. The rooms are smartly designed, well-equipped, and maintained to a high standard. Room service was consistently prompt, and the overall service experience was excellent.

A special mention to Anuj, who ensured I had ice for my Diet Coke every evening within minutes of my request, and to Preetisha at the reception, whose efficiency and thoughtful recommendations for nearby shopping and dining options were greatly appreciated.

I would highly recommend this property and will certainly choose to stay here again on future visits.

editorialSummary.text: Polished hotel featuring an outdoor pool & 8 restaurants & bars, plus spa & a gym.

text.text:
This hotel is definitely not a five-star place.

The location is great, especially if youre in town for the visa services nearby. But if you’re looking for a quiet place to sleep, this might not be the best choice.

Rooms: They’re not well maintained. Not filthy, but not as clean as you’d expect. The floors aren’t very clean, the bathroom has leaky pipes, and the taps don’t work well. The shower temperature is a hit or miss.

Noise: There’s a loud club on the premises. I was lucky it didn’t bother me much, but if your room is close to it, it could be really annoying. Honestly, I don’t understand why there’s a club in this hotel.

Gym: The gym hours are strange - it opens late and closes early, which was odd.

Hallways: They can get noisy. My room was near a maintenance area where staff kept their cleaning supplies. There were lots of banging doors late at night. A few signs asking people to be quieter would help.

Overall, for the price it’s okay. Probably more of a three-star hotel at best, but definitely not five-star quality.

text.text:
Overall, this hotel was very poor value for money and did not meet basic expectations. The issues were several:

The staff member at check in was extremely rude and unhelpful. They claimed our Booking.com reservation was cancelled and the only way to stay was to pay double the price upfront for a lower tier room. This was at 10.30PM so there was obviously no other real choice, which the staff member understood. At first the staff member claimed the hotel was fully sold out before claiming one room was available for double the price. This was clearly a scam.

Our room was a non smoking room. However, the room had an extremely heavy stench of smoke, and several cigarette burn marks.

There was a very long hair inside the bed. No one staying at the room had this long of hair, or this colour, so it can only lead you to believe they did not clean the bed.

The bed had three large stains on the sheets.

The shower was extremely dirty, with soap stains and hair from previous guests all over the place.

The room was extremely loud throughout the night, and in the morning with music / construction work.

The rooms are very dated and in need of maintenance. Things are held together with masking tape and poorly cleaned.

The WiFi did not work. Upon calling the front desk for assistance, we were met with a very rude and unhelpful staff member, who was dismissive. So, we did not have any WiFi during the stay.

If the hotel was half the price, it may be worth it. Otherwise, do not bother booking here. The city has much better to offer for similar / cheaper prices.

text.text:
I didn’t even stay at this hotel, but I had the worst experience with them. I booked a room for a guest for business purposes, paid with the company card, and even received a confirmation email. The next morning, I suddenly got a message that my booking was cancelled.

When I called the property, the lady on the phone was extremely rude. She said it wasn’t her concern and that they only accept the guest’s card — even though they had already deducted the amount from the company card! When I asked why they didn’t inform me earlier, she bluntly told me to “contact the travel agent” and not call the property.

The audacity and unprofessionalism were shocking. This is by far the worst experience I’ve ever had with a hotel.

The staff showed a lack of responsibility, and the room tariffs remain very high for the service provided.

I recommend choosing The Lalit Great Eastern instead. I will not be using this Park hotel anymore.

editorialSummary.text: Elegant, posh lodging offering free breakfast, 5 restaurants & an extensive spa.

text.text:
The Lalit Great Eastern Hotel in Kolkata offers a mix of heritage charm and luxury. I stayed in the old legacy building, which had a unique atmosphere with its vintage architecture and even an iron pillar inside the room. The room itself was spacious, though the flooring had an issue as it kept getting uncomfortably wet during the stay.

The morning breakfast buffet was a highlight, especially the tea, which deserves a special mention for its excellent taste and freshness. Service overall was polite and attentive.

However, the hotel’s guest policy was disappointing—restricting outside visitors from 8 pm to 8 am felt unnecessary and unreasonable for a luxury property. A cutoff at 11 pm or midnight would be understandable, but an 8 pm restriction is more suited to a hospital than a five-star hotel.

Overall, while the heritage charm, spacious rooms, and great breakfast stand out, the wet flooring issue and impractical guest policy detract from what should otherwise be a seamless luxury experience.

text.text:
It's an exceptional heritage property, with beautiful architecture and tasteful decor inside out.

Felt truly privileged to stay at such a beautiful property which has probably improvised and kept upgrading with the passage of time. Was intrigued by the 180 year old seal kept at the reception, and the vintage piano in the lobby area.

The room was impeccably clean and tidy. The window view was towards a lovely courtyard.

The breakfast spread was varied and quite vast, had  scrumptious food at the start of a very important day ahead.

The staff is extremely polite, well behaved and caring. They also extended our check out time by an hour and half which was very helpful as I was travelling with my senior citizen Father.

The proximity to Howrah station is a plus point, and there are quite nice restaurants in the vicinity in case you want to dine out.

Definitely worth staying once in your lifetime! Totally recommend it 👍🏼

text.text:
The Lalit has been our Kolkata hotel of choice for the past decades because of their amazing hospitality, however, this time we were really surprised at the service downgrade in the Front Office department.  We were given a lower category room than what we booked (luckily the type of room was printed in the registration form).  Only after we asked about this did the front office night manager give the reasoning that because the hotel was fully booked they had to do this.  So we were downgraded with no recourse, but since it was past midnight, we thought to take it up with front office manager in the morning.

Now for the part of our HORRENDOUS experience, the Front Office Manager, this gentleman was not even willing to listen to, or to look at the documents. His position was that as a Guest, we cannot understand what happened.  After showing him the photograph of the reservation form & registration form, he started flailing and shouting in an even higher tone. Luckily, the acting Hotel manager. Mr Sunayan was there to clear this issue with all the grace and hospitality that the Lalit Grant Eastern has always been known for. If it was not for Mr. Sunayan and the amazing staff at the Lalit, I think our trip would have been ruined. If the Hotel would like the name of the front office manager, please do let me know.
As for Mr. Sunayan, no words can express the relief of sanity and level of service he provided. The Executive Sous Chef, Mr Krishan Chaddha, made sure our FNB experience was amazing.

With the history I have shared with the Lalit, it would have been a sad ending if not for the service recovery by Mr Sunayan and his team.  Thank you.
I have deducted one star from Service, for the attitude of your front office manager.

text.text:
I absolutely loved my stay at Raajkutir. The property exudes an old-world charm with its beautiful architecture and lush greenery that creates a peaceful, nostalgic atmosphere. The ambience truly transports you to another era.

Room service was top-notch—attentive, prompt, and warm. The breakfast spread was generous and delicious, offering a variety of options to start the day right.

One of the highlights of my stay was the evening aarti experience, perfectly complemented by a cup of masala tea and a serving of jhal muri. It was magical and deeply calming—something I’ll remember for a long time.

text.text:
It was indeed a royal experience. The ambiance created by the old Bengali royalty theme was overwhelming, transporting us to a different era altogether. The detailing in the decor caught the attention. The rooms were spacious and simple but elegant in decor.

On the flip side, the pool was tiny, more suited for photoshoots than swimming. The attached bathroom was quite small and ordinary. The food menu in the main restaurant was very limited (especially for lunch and dinner), though the buffet breakfast was good.

Overall the open, spacious courtyard surrounded by traditional corridors was the highlight of this property.

text.text:
It is going to be a fairly long review so bear along.

The moment one enters the hotel, it is simply impossible for the person to really grasp the scale of it.

We were greeted at the door by Ms/Mrs. Fulmoni who warmly welcomed us with arati. We checked in to our room and the entire process was very smooth. The room was very spacious and well furnished along with all the necessities. We also got some welcome chocolates which was tasty. The bathroom had good fittings. Didn't get an opportunity at an upgrade at this property, I believe it was thoroughly booked out.

After that we headed towards the in-house resturant East India Room for our lunch where we were really well attended to and taken care of by the manager Mr. Amrit Krishna Jena and Mr. Koushik. We were also visited by sous chef Ankur Halder who asked about our food preferences and suggested foods accordingly. The food was really really good except for the naan which I didn't really find as per my expectations. I also found it a bit off that a dessert was supposed to be shared by an entire family but I suppose that is the standard policy.

We then enjoyed a very cultural evening consisting of Puja arati and folk dance performance which was fabulously complimented with the "cutting chai" and Jhal Muri they served with their compliments. Mr. Chandan really attended us well and gave as an extra chai with ginger, which was nice.

After that we headed to the bar The Swig where I had one of the best cocktails ever, named Mojito 54. It was so good. I can't emphasize enough how much one should try it. Thanks to the bartender!

Next morning, we got a guided tour of the entire 13.5 acre property from Ms/Mrs. Paromita which was excellent, just excellent. She thoroughly explained the entirety of the property and the reasons behind certain designs and other minute details.

I also had a word with a manager and chef none of whose name I recall regarding the naan and they explained why it was the way it was.

Mr. Raj at reception shared a heartfelt goodbye along with his other colleagues whom I mentioned before and we clicked some memorable photos as well. It was really nice but I won't be attaching those to respect their privacy.

Even apart from the humble gentlemen and gentlewomen I mentioned in my review there were many others who made our stay really really great.

Now let's break down some of my likes and bit of my dislikes:

Likes:
1. A really secluded and nested away property which doesn't get many fly-by guests so it is peaceful.
2. One of the best hotel services I've ever experienced, definitely in my top ten as of now.
3. Well maintained and clean rooms.
4. Flute in the morning is absolutely awesome.
5. Good spread for breakfast.
6. Attention to detail.

Dislikes:
1. Extremely limited set menu option, and I mean extremely limited.
2. One dessert for three people to share.
3. Naan is not the typical Mughal Naan we are mostly accustomed to.
4. Really small pool.
5. The bathing area could have been entirely closed off with a glass door from the rest of the bathroom.
6. The complimentary sides served with the cocktail wasn't good.

Overall even though there are other hotels I would choose for rooms and other restaurants I would prefer to East India Room, I would select this hotel in a heartbeat simply for their attentive service!

editorialSummary.text: Colonial-style hotel offering unpretentious rooms, a terrace & a patio garden, plus free breakfast.

text.text:
The Elgin Fairlawn exudes genuine colonial charm—graceful arches, vintage wooden fans, framed black-and-white photos, and cozy lounge chairs. It feels like stepping into a bygone era yet with comfort intact. The café and Imperial Dining area strike a perfect balance: elegant yet unpretentious.
We ordered their special Chicken Club Sandwich, Chicken Lasagna, Tahiti and Fresh lime soda. The food was delicious and quantity was good enough for two person. Their was a soothing music in the background. There was NO AC, but we did not feel any heat. The experience was wonderful and very wholesome.

text.text:
Disappointing Experience – Not Recommended, Especially for B2B - Booking confirmation CAV-2708

Our recent stay at this hotel was extremely disappointing. The quality of food and service was far below expectations. There was neither proper food nor proper service throughout our stay. Shockingly, the entire hotel had only one chef, which clearly reflected in the poor meal management.

During breakfast, one day we were served idly without sambar, and on the next day, there was sambar but no idly or vada. Such inconsistency in basic food items is unacceptable, especially for business travelers or group bookings.

From a B2B perspective, this hotel is a complete letdown. The customer service was terrible, with unresponsive staff and no sense of urgency to resolve issues. Overall, I would not recommend this property to anyone looking for a reliable or professionally managed hotel experience.

Very delicious dinner and all the items were impeccable.

text.text:
Don't book a room here if you plan on sleeping. There's a pub/DJ on the ground floor, and it feels like trying to sleep on stage while the music is blasting. Rooms are not soundproof at all. I could hear people chatting at reception from my first-floor room over the loud edm blasted by the DJ.

I'm amazed that someone in management thought keeping a DJ blasting on the ground floor till 4 am, right under the guest rooms, was a smart move.

The reception staff was humble enough to shift me to a room far from the DJ hall, but honestly, not much changed. At least he did what he could.

Another thing: some rooms are internally connected by a locked door (hotel's lock, not ours). They say it's secure, but it can be opened from both sides, which doesn't feel safe.

On the bright side, banquet hall and service are great, hotel is well maintained... but if you can't sleep, what's the point?
Typing the review 3 in the morning, unable to sleep, wide awake.

text.text:
We stayed for three nights at this wonderful hotel. We loved the location, as it is close to the Maidan district and New Market. On our first evening, we had dinner and drinks at the Deck 88 bar—the Smoked Negroni cocktail was delicious. The food is fairly simple. Another night, we dined at the hotel's restaurant, Kebab-E-Que, where the food was excellent, especially their chicken kebab.

The breakfast buffet offers a wide variety of sweet and savory options, and their pancakes are delicious! We booked the Exclusive Room, which was perfect—spacious and spotlessly clean. Housekeeping is available daily if requested.

The staff is friendly and professional. We would gladly return to this charming hotel with its ideal location!

text.text:
My stay in Calcutta was for just one night and this hotel was the closest to the US embassy and so under company recommendation booked it. Honestly the room that i recieved was next to the spa so there was a lot of noise that i could hear when i switched off the AC and heavy cigarette smell from the duct in the bathroom above the bath tub.

What they have got right is thier customer service. At about past midnight i developed a severe abdominal pain with nausea so i called the reception to let them know that i need to get to the emergency because i was unable to bear it. Priya at the reception took swift action and sent Nisha to my room , who accompanied me to the hospital( they arranged for a car with security) , stood and helped me throughout at the hospital and got me back to the room safely. I am immensely thankful to both of them for their kind support and help. Priya ensured to check on me the next morning too.

Thank you for helping me get through that night!

text.text:
❌♿ ✅🏳️‍🌈 ✅🚻 ❌🐕 ✅💰 ✅💳

One of the best hotels I have stayed ever in this budget. The hotel is situated at the very strategic place and very near to Rabindra Bhavan Metro Station. The Park street market is on the walking distance from here.

The rooms are relatively small but good for queen size bed. Full of all necessary facilities like closet, TV, Intercom phone, Desk with Chair, side table and tea/coffee set. The toilet was quite clean and hygienic with nice shower panel. They have the dispensers installed for Shower gel and Shampoo. They provide all necessary toiletries and towels.

The staff are quite humble and decent.

The quality of food is awesome. The buffet breakfast was quite good. They used to serve freshly made Dosa in the table. The fresh cut fruits counter was full of fruits and juices.

During our stay I did not find anything adverse to share here.

The hotel is not accessible to wheelchair ♿. Availability of plenty of RO drinking 🚰 water. This restaurant is LGBTQ+ 🌈 Friendly.

Rooms are very neat and clean.  well maintained. All the services are very good and satisfactory. Food service in the restaurant especially the service of Ms.Sharma was very much satisfactory. We prefer this Hotel to stay whenever we visit Kolkata.
This time our only regret was , we booked two rooms on 30th Nov.2024 to 2nd Dec. 24. but we could check in only at 1.30 -2.00 midnight on 30th because of ours was late night flight from Mumbai. On 2nd Dec.  our return flight was at 9.45 p.m. as we had to attend one marriage in the afternoon for which we requested to accommodate us in one room till 6 p.m with concessional rate  but they accommodated with half rate as permissible.  As customer friendly   our request might have been considered . This is for the kind attention of the concerned authorities.
Otherwise our stay all the time are very satisfactory and comfortable in all respects.

places.formattedAddress: HUDCO MORE, 67, Bagmari Rd, near Ultadanga, Ghose Bagan, Kolkata, West Bengal 700054, India
places.adrFormatAddress: HUDCO MORE, 67, Bagmari Rd, near Ultadanga, Ghose Bagan, Kolkata, West Bengal 700054, India
places.shortFormattedAddress: HUDCO MORE, 67, Bagmari Rd, Ultadanga, Kolkata

text.text:
The room which we booked was the basic room, situated on 2nd floor, perfect for couple or 2 adults. Room was clean with all basic amenities. The service was top notch, the staff was really good.

Talking about the food. It was finger licking good. I really enjoyed the food here and kept ordering as you can see in the photos.

First day order was - veg pulao and dal tadka in lunch. The taste was really good.
Evening time ordered masala tea and crispy chilli chicken. Loved it.
The tea was okay.

Second day order for lunch - chicken tandoori, mix veg and roti
Chicken tandoori was soft juicy tender perfectly cooked, taste was really nice.
Mix veg 10/10

I must say they about the quantity of the food, one plate order is enough for two adults.

The only drawback was the safety, as the window gets open if you want to smoke you can do that there but they doesn't have any safety grill. Have to be careful if you are with children.

It's centrally located in main road but once you get inside the room it's quiet because of the sound proof windows.

The check in and check out was hassle free. Doesn't have to wait.

I booked it through clear trip in an offer so we got the room for Rs 5609 including tax for 2 nights. And including food the total amount was upto Rs 9600 approx.

It was a wonderful stay. Highly recommended. If not for stay then at least can try their restaurant "Page 54" For amazing food.

Thank you for your lovely service.

text.text:
1. Location & Ambience

Nestled in Ghose Bagan (Bagmari Road / HUDCO More), guests describe it as “centrally located” yet surprisingly peaceful—even with the city buzz around  .

Access to transport (metro, cabs, airport) is rated very convenient  .

2. Cleanliness & Rooms

Rooms are consistently described as spacious, well-appointed, and immaculately clean  .

Bathrooms with separate glass showers are a hit—modern and well-maintained  .

3. Service & Staff

Staff receive top marks for professionalism, warmth, and responsiveness. Guests frequently mention names like Riya, Kakuli, Tanushka, Surajit, and Biswajit for going above and beyond  .

Room service, front desk, and dining staff earn praise for being helpful and friendly  .

4. Dining & Breakfast

Buffet breakfast stands out as a strong point—diverse, hygienic, and delicious  .

The in-house restaurant menu is praised, particularly for its food quality and ambiance—one guest even enjoyed a memorable candlelight dinner  .

5. Value & Comfort

The hotel delivers excellent value for money with robust amenities—air conditioning, CCTV, 24-hour front desk/security—without high-end pricing

text.text:
My stay at Aauris Hotel on Park Street was nothing short of exceptional. Nestled in the vibrant heart of Kolkata, the hotel’s prime location offers effortless access to the city’s cultural and culinary delights, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers.

The rooms  were elegantly appointed, blending contemporary comfort with thoughtful touches that ensured a relaxing retreat after a day of exploration. Impeccably clean and well-maintained, they provided a serene haven amidst the city’s energy.

However, the true highlight was the dining experience. The hotel’s restaurant - Zyqa was outstanding, offering a delectable array of dishes that celebrated both local flavors and global cuisine. Each meal was a delight, crafted with precision and served with finesse. Equally impressive was the in-room dining —prompt, efficient, and consistently delicious.

What truly set Aauris apart was its staff. Tamal, Sanjib, and the entire team exemplified professionalism and warmth, attending to every request with genuine care and efficiency. Their hospitality elevated the experience, making me feel not just welcomed, but truly valued.

For those seeking a refined stay in Kolkata, Aauris Hotel delivers on every front—luxury, convenience, and impeccable service. I would eagerly return and highly recommend it to discerning travelers.

text.text:
⭐ Rating: 2/5

Location and Rooms: 👍
The only two saving graces of Hotel Monotel are its proximity to Sector V metro station and the room aesthetics, which are reasonably comparable to a typical 3 or 4-star hotel.

Food and Service: 👎
The room service food was very underwhelming—it genuinely felt like something you'd get from a random street vendor, just served on a fancy plate. To make things worse, the staff kept insisting on payment immediately after every order, despite clearly requesting to settle all bills during checkout. It felt quite unprofessional.

Staff Behavior and Facilities: 🚩

The staff’s attitude was borderline rude. Even asking for basic things like tea or coffee sachet refills was treated as a major favor, complete with eye rolls and "didn't we already give you in the morning?" interrogations. Totally unnecessary and uncomfortable.

On top of that, most of the staff walk around with expressionless faces, avoiding eye contact as if hoping no one asks them for help. It genuinely felt like they just didn’t want to work or be bothered.

Check-in and check-out were delayed without any valid reason. We were the only guests at the reception during both times, yet it felt like they were doing us a favor by processing our request.

Elevators were non-functional at least four times during our short 2-night stay. Once, both elevators were down, forcing us to climb five floors with our luggage.

The gym is a joke—tiny space, outdated machines, and a dangerous treadmill with a slippery and broken surface. Honestly, it's a safety hazard. (Pictures attached). Even few attachments are broken.

Final verdict:
While the location and room aesthetics are decent, the overall experience was frustrating and far from what you'd expect at this price point. With poor staff attitude, unreliable facilities, and questionable food quality, I cannot recommend this hotel unless major improvements are made.

text.text:
I recently stayed at this hotel and had a wonderful experience. The location is excellent, with popular attractions like Nicco Park, Eco Park, and the Salt Lake Stadium just a short drive away, making it very convenient for sightseeing.

The staff are polite, courteous, and always ready to help, which really added to the comfort of our stay. The in-house restaurant Rendezvous is a highlight – the food is not only delicious but also offers plenty of healthy options. During the ilish season, they even serve authentic ilish dishes, which was a delightful treat.

The rooms are well-maintained, clean, and spacious enough to comfortably accommodate two adults and two kids, making it a great choice for families. Overall, it’s a perfect blend of good location, warm hospitality, and great food.

text.text:
We stayed at this hotel for 3 days and had a really good experience overall.

1. Location:The location is excellent, within walking distance to Park Street and the New Market area, which was very convenient.

2. Room:We stayed in an executive room which was neat, clean, and well-maintained. No complaints at all.

3. Service:The service was impressive. The staff were polite, helpful, and always willing to assist with anything we needed.

4. Breakfast :The breakfast buffet was decent with a fair variety of options.

5. Restaurant:The hotel has an attached restaurant (Rupsi Bangla). We found the food to be average – nothing exceptional, but okay for a meal or two.

6. Others:We had an evening flight and needed to check out early, but the hotel staff kindly stored our luggage till the evening. There was also a weighing scale available to check our luggage weight, which was really helpful.
Overall, we had a very pleasant stay and would definitely choose this hotel again if I return to Kolkata.

text.text:
There are a few wear and tear in the bathroom. The shower part floor tiles were broken and missing. The corners are filthy, I would suggest HARPIC RED to get rid of those unpleasant looking stains. The toilet seats are worn out, lost it's polish because of using harsh chemicals like HARPIC, I assume. The bathroom fittings like the shower and taps need to be replaced. The owner can replace them using 1 nights money EASILY.

The staff is very well behaved, 5 star for that. But they might need 1 star training in order to deserve a 5 star rating. Welcome drink was a surprise though.

The rooms are spacious without compromise, safe was there, mini refrigerator, silent AC, the ceiling fan was wobbling and very noisy at low speed Room#405

The hotel's restaurant is very very nice and the chef is simply the best, we did meet him and thanked him enough.

The breakfast was sooo good. Everything from fresh in house watermelon and pineapple and papaya juices, different types of cornflakes, sweets, pastries, cakes and cupcakes, jams, butter, coffee, tea, palm dates, dry fruits, fresh cut fruits, parathas, poor and idlis and poha and what not. The last time I visited Kolkata, I had stayed at the LALIT GREAT EASTERN but this KEMPTON beat it easily believe me, just miniature if compared but a champion. I'll definitely stay here once again.

The location is fantastic, landmark location. The ONLY major issue was the noise from neighboring buildings, the constant loud roar of Air Conditioner outdoor units chewed up our brains no exaggeration believe me.

PLEASE REPLACE THE BATHROOM FITTINGS and replace the floor tiles in the bathroom. before I come again :))))

text.text:
The ITC Royal Bengal hotel is an exquisite establishment that offers a truly luxurious and memorable experience. From the moment you step into the grand lobby, you are greeted with a sense of opulence and elegance.

The hotel boasts a wide range of rooms and suites, each meticulously designed with modern amenities and tasteful decor. The rooms are spacious, comfortable, and equipped with all the necessary conveniences for a pleasant stay. The attention to detail is evident in every aspect of the room, from the plush bedding to the well-appointed bathrooms.

One of the highlights of the ITC Royal Bengal is its exceptional dining options. The hotel features a variety of restaurants serving cuisines from around the world, including Indian, Chinese, and European. The quality of the food is exceptional, with each dish prepared with precision and creativity. Whether you're indulging in traditional Indian delicacies or savoring international flavors, the culinary experience at this hotel is truly outstanding.

The hotel also offers a range of facilities to cater to every guest's needs. The spa and wellness center provides a serene oasis where you can relax and rejuvenate with a variety of treatments and therapies. The fitness center is well-equipped and offers state-of-the-art equipment for those who want to stay active during their stay.

The service at the ITC Royal Bengal is impeccable. The staff is friendly, attentive, and goes above and beyond to ensure that every guest feels welcomed and well taken care of. Whether it's arranging transportation, making reservations, or providing local recommendations, the staff is always ready to assist with a warm smile.

In conclusion, the ITC Royal Bengal hotel is a true gem in the heart of the city. With its luxurious accommodations, exceptional dining options, and top-notch service, it offers an unparalleled experience for discerning travelers. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, a stay at this hotel is sure to leave a lasting impression.

text.text:
**ITC Royal Bengal Hotel: A Luxurious Oasis in Kolkata**

Kolkata, the cultural capital of India, is not only known for its rich history, vibrant festivals, and delectable cuisine but also for its luxurious hospitality offerings. Among these, the ITC Royal Bengal Hotel stands out as a shining beacon of opulence and grandeur, redefining the city's hospitality landscape. Let's take a closer look at what makes this hotel a haven for discerning travelers.

**Architectural Marvel:**
The ITC Royal Bengal Hotel is not just a place to stay; it's an architectural marvel that seamlessly blends contemporary design with traditional elements. Designed by renowned architect Hafeez Contractor, the hotel's facade is inspired by the local red soil of Bengal, paying homage to the region's heritage. The interior spaces are equally impressive, with meticulously curated decor that reflects a perfect harmony of luxury and comfort.

**Luxurious Accommodations:**
One of the defining features of the ITC Royal Bengal Hotel is its exquisite accommodations. The hotel boasts a range of rooms and suites, each thoughtfully designed to cater to the needs of modern travelers. From spacious executive rooms to lavish suites offering panoramic views of the city skyline, every corner of the hotel exudes elegance and sophistication.

**Culinary Delights:**
Food aficionados are in for a treat at the ITC Royal Bengal Hotel, which is home to some of Kolkata's finest dining establishments. The hotel's signature restaurants serve a diverse array of culinary delights, from authentic Bengali cuisine at 'Grand Market Pavilion' to innovative global fare at 'Ottimo Cucina Italiana.' Additionally, guests can unwind at the stylish bars and lounges, indulging in expertly crafted cocktails and premium spirits.

**Wellness and Recreation:**
For those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, the hotel offers an array of wellness facilities. The Kaya Kalp Spa is a sanctuary of serenity, offering a range of therapeutic treatments to soothe the mind, body, and soul. Fitness enthusiasts can stay active at the state-of-the-art gymnasium or take a refreshing dip in the swimming pool surrounded by lush greenery.

**Meetings and Events:**
With its expansive banquet halls and cutting-edge conference facilities, the ITC Royal Bengal Hotel is also a preferred destination for business travelers. Whether hosting corporate meetings, conferences, or social gatherings, the hotel's dedicated events team ensures seamless execution and unparalleled service.

**Sustainability Initiatives:**
ITC Hotels are renowned for their commitment to sustainability, and the ITC Royal Bengal Hotel is no exception. The property incorporates eco-friendly practices across its operations, including energy conservation, waste management, and community engagement, making it a responsible choice for conscious travelers.

**Impeccable Hospitality:**
What truly sets the ITC Royal Bengal Hotel apart is its impeccable hospitality. The staff, known for their warmth and professionalism, go above and beyond to ensure that every guest experience is memorable and delightful. Whether it's arranging personalized excursions, attending to dietary preferences, or simply offering a friendly smile, the hospitality at this hotel is second to none.

In conclusion, the ITC Royal Bengal Hotel in Kolkata is not just a place to stay; it's an experience in itself. From its stunning architecture and luxurious accommodations to its delectable dining options and exemplary service, every aspect of this hotel is designed to enchant and delight. Whether visiting Kolkata for business or leisure, a stay at the ITC Royal Bengal Hotel promises a truly unforgettable journey.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at ITC Royal Bengal in Kolkata, and it was nothing short of spectacular! This hotel truly defines luxury — from its breathtaking architecture to its world-class hospitality.

🏨 Rooms & Views:
Spacious, elegant, and meticulously designed. I was lucky to experience both city view and landscape view, and each was absolutely mesmerizing. Waking up to such beautiful scenery felt magical.

🍽️ Breakfast & Dining:
The breakfast spread here is a dream come true for food lovers — a huge variety including South Indian delicacies, authentic Japanese dishes, and much more. Every bite was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented.

💁‍♀️ Service:
The hospitality is unmatched. Every staff member I met was warm, attentive, and dedicated to making the stay perfect. Service: 10/10.

🏊 Facilities:
From the stunning swimming pool to the grand lobby, everything radiates elegance. The attention to detail in design and cleanliness is outstanding.

💰 Value for Money:
For the luxury offered, the room tariff per night is surprisingly reasonable. This makes it not just a luxurious escape but also a great value.

✅ Final Verdict:
ITC Royal Bengal is hands down the most beautiful hotel I have ever seen. Whether you’re visiting Kolkata for business or leisure, you must experience at least one night here. It’s not just a stay — it’s a memory you’ll cherish forever.

⭐ Overall Rating: 10/10 — Highly Recommended!

The Taj Bengal Kolkata is a luxurious five-star hotel that exudes elegance and sophistication. From the moment you step into the grand lobby, you are greeted with impeccable service and a warm atmosphere. This iconic hotel is located in the heart of Kolkata, making it convenient for both business and leisure travelers.

The rooms at Taj Bengal Kolkata are spacious, beautifully decorated, and equipped with modern amenities. The comfortable beds, plush furnishings, and tasteful decor create a serene and relaxing ambiance. The attention to detail and personalized service provided by the staff ensure that guests have a truly memorable stay.

One of the highlights of this hotel is its dining options. From traditional Indian cuisine to international delights, the restaurants at Taj Bengal Kolkata offer a wide array of culinary experiences. The food is prepared with finesse and the flavors are exquisite. Whether you choose to dine at the award-winning Sonargaon or the casual Chinoiserie, you are guaranteed a gastronomic journey that will tantalize your taste buds.

The Taj Bengal Kolkata also boasts excellent facilities, including a well-equipped fitness center, a rejuvenating spa, and a beautiful outdoor pool. The hotel's business center and meeting rooms cater to the needs of business travelers, while the recreational facilities provide ample opportunities for relaxation and leisure.

In conclusion, the Taj Bengal Kolkata is a luxury hotel that surpasses expectations. Its impeccable service, elegant ambiance, and world-class amenities make it a perfect choice for those seeking a truly indulgent experience. Whether you are visiting Kolkata for business or pleasure, this hotel is sure to leave a lasting impression.

text.text:
Taj Bengal Kolkata: A Luxurious Retreat in the Heart of Kolkata

Nestled amidst the vibrant city of Kolkata, the Taj Bengal stands as a majestic landmark of elegance and hospitality. From the moment you step into the grand lobby, you are enveloped in an atmosphere of refined luxury, with attentive staff ready to cater to your every need.

**Accommodation**

The hotel's well-appointed rooms and suites offer a haven of comfort and tranquility. Spacious and tastefully decorated, each room features plush bedding, modern amenities, and stunning views of the cityscape or lush gardens. The club rooms and suites provide access to the exclusive Taj Club lounge, where you can enjoy personalized service, complimentary breakfast, and a selection of refreshments throughout the day.

**Dining**

The Taj Bengal is a culinary paradise, boasting a diverse range of restaurants and bars to tantalize your taste buds. From authentic Bengali cuisine at Benjarong to Italian delicacies at La Cucina, there is something to satisfy every palate. For a truly indulgent experience, head to Zodiac Grill, where you can savor expertly grilled meats and seafood amidst a sophisticated ambiance.

**Amenities**

The hotel's extensive amenities ensure an unforgettable stay. Relax by the tranquil outdoor pool, rejuvenate at the Jiva Spa, or work out in the well-equipped fitness center. For business travelers, the Taj Bengal offers state-of-the-art meeting rooms and business center facilities.

**Location**

Strategically located in the heart of Kolkata's business district, the Taj Bengal is within easy reach of the city's major attractions, including Victoria Memorial, St. Paul's Cathedral, and the Indian Museum. The hotel is also conveniently situated near the airport, making it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers.

**Overall Experience**

The Taj Bengal Kolkata is a true gem among Kolkata's luxury hotels. With its impeccable service, luxurious accommodations, and world-class amenities, the hotel provides an unparalleled experience for discerning travelers. Whether you are seeking a relaxing getaway or a productive business trip, the Taj Bengal is sure to exceed your expectations.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Taj Bengal Kolkata, and I was absolutely blown away by the experience. The hotel is located in the heart of the city, and it is absolutely stunning. The rooms are spacious and luxurious, and the service is top-notch. I was particularly impressed by the front office staff, especially Suprina, Abhijeet, and Wahid. They were all so helpful and accommodating, and they went above and beyond to make my stay as enjoyable as possible.

One of the things that I loved most about the Taj Bengal Kolkata is the food. The hotel has a number of restaurants to choose from, and the food is all delicious. I especially enjoyed the Indian food at Cal27, and the Italian food at La Piazza. The hotel also has a number of bars, and the cocktails are excellent.

In addition to the great food and service, the Taj Bengal Kolkata also has a number of other amenities that make it a great place to stay. The hotel has a swimming pool, a fitness center, and a spa. There is also a business center and a library.

Overall, I had an absolutely amazing experience at the Taj Bengal Kolkata. The hotel is beautiful, the service is top-notch, and the food is delicious. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a luxurious and unforgettable stay in Kolkata.

Here are some specific examples of the great service that I received from Suprina, Abhijeet, and Wahid:

Suprina was incredibly helpful when I was checking in. She went out of her way to make sure that I had everything I needed for my stay.

Abhijeet was always available to answer my questions and help me with anything I needed. He was always friendly and helpful.

Wahid was the bellman, and he was incredibly attentive. He made sure that my luggage was taken care of, and he was always willing to help me with anything I needed.

I would like to thank Suprina, Abhijeet, and Wahid for making my stay at the Taj Bengal Kolkata so enjoyable. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a luxurious and unforgettable stay in Kolkata.

text.text:
A Memorable Experience at Hyatt Regency, Kolkata

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Hyatt Regency Kolkata, and I must say, it was an extraordinary experience from start to finish. From the moment I entered the hotel, I was greeted with warm smiles and exceptional hospitality that made me feel right at home.

The hotel's architecture and design are stunning, blending modern aesthetics with traditional elements of Kolkata's rich cultural heritage. The lobby area exudes elegance and sophistication, setting the tone for an unforgettable stay. The attention to detail throughout the hotel is truly commendable, and it's clear that no expense has been spared to create a luxurious and comfortable environment for guests.

The rooms at Hyatt Regency Kolkata are spacious, beautifully furnished, and thoughtfully designed to cater to every need. The plush bedding ensured a restful night's sleep, and the amenities provided were of the highest quality. The panoramic views of the city from my room were simply breathtaking, offering a glimpse of the vibrant life that Kolkata has to offer.

The dining options at the hotel are a culinary delight. The variety of restaurants and bars cater to all tastes and preferences. Whether you're in the mood for authentic Indian cuisine, international flavors, or a refreshing cocktail, you'll find it all at Hyatt Regency Kolkata. I particularly enjoyed the sumptuous breakfast buffet, which featured an extensive spread of delicious dishes to suit every palate.

One aspect that truly sets Hyatt Regency Kolkata apart is its exceptional service. The staff members are friendly, professional, and go above and beyond to ensure that every guest has a memorable stay. From the concierge desk to the housekeeping staff, everyone I encountered was dedicated to providing top-notch service and making my stay as comfortable as possible.

The hotel's facilities are second to none. The fitness center is well-equipped, allowing guests to maintain their workout routines while traveling. The pool area is a serene oasis, perfect for relaxing and unwinding after a long day of exploring the city. Additionally, the spa offers a range of rejuvenating treatments that provide a true sense of tranquility and well-being.

Location-wise, the hotel is conveniently situated near major attractions and business districts, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers. The efficient transportation options available from the hotel further enhance its accessibility, allowing guests to explore Kolkata with ease.

Overall, my experience at Hyatt Regency Kolkata exceeded all expectations. The combination of luxurious accommodations, exquisite dining, impeccable service, and convenient location make it the perfect choice for anyone visiting this vibrant city. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for an exceptional stay in Kolkata.

The staff members are attentive, friendly, and go above and beyond to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of guests. text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at ITC Sonar Bangla in Kolkata for a delightful two-night getaway, and I must say, it was an experience that exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I entered the elegant premises, I was captivated by the grandeur and attention to detail.

The hotel's ambiance exuded a perfect blend of opulence and warmth. The staff greeted me with genuine smiles and impeccable hospitality, making me feel like a valued guest throughout my stay. The check-in process was swift and seamless, allowing me to settle in quickly and start enjoying the amenities.

My room at ITC Sonar Bangla was an oasis of comfort and sophistication. The tastefully decorated space boasted contemporary furnishings, plush bedding, and state-of-the-art amenities. The attention to detail was evident in every aspect, from the carefully selected artwork to the luxurious bathroom adorned with premium toiletries.

One of the highlights of my stay was the dining experience at the hotel's various restaurants. Each venue showcased a diverse range of cuisines, and I found myself indulging in delectable dishes from around the world. The quality of the food was outstanding, and the culinary team's expertise was evident in every bite. The attentive service further enhanced the dining experience, ensuring that every meal was a memorable one.

The hotel's facilities were equally impressive. I took advantage of the fitness center, which was well-equipped with modern machines and offered a refreshing environment for my workout sessions. Additionally, the spa provided a serene sanctuary where I could unwind and rejuvenate with a pampering massage, leaving me feeling relaxed and revitalized.

ITC Sonar Bangla's commitment to sustainability also deserves commendation. The property showcased several eco-friendly initiatives, such as rainwater harvesting and energy-efficient practices, which resonated with my own values and made my stay even more enjoyable.

The location of the hotel was another plus point. Situated amidst lush greenery, it provided a peaceful retreat away from the bustling city. However, it was still conveniently located near major attractions, making it easy to explore the vibrant culture and heritage of Kolkata.

Overall, my two-night stay at ITC Sonar Bangla was nothing short of exceptional. The hotel's exquisite ambiance, impeccable service, luxurious amenities, and delectable dining options created an unforgettable experience. I would highly recommend this haven of indulgence to anyone seeking a remarkable stay in Kolkata. I certainly look forward to returning in the future.

The hotel's facilities were equally impressive. I took advantage of the fitness center, which was well-equipped with modern machines and offered a refreshing environment for my workout sessions. Additionally, the spa provided a serene sanctuary where I could unwind and rejuvenate with a pampering massage, leaving me feeling relaxed and revitalized.

ITC Sonar Bangla's commitment to sustainability also deserves commendation. The property showcased several eco-friendly initiatives, such as rainwater harvesting and energy-efficient practices, which resonated with my own values and made my stay even more enjoyable.

The location of the hotel was another plus point. Situated amidst lush greenery, it provided a peaceful retreat away from the bustling city. However, it was still conveniently located near major attractions, making it easy to explore the vibrant culture and heritage of Kolkata.

Overall, my two-night stay at ITC Sonar Bangla was nothing short of exceptional. The hotel's exquisite ambiance, impeccable service, luxurious amenities, and delectable dining options created an unforgettable experience. I would highly recommend this haven of indulgence to anyone seeking a remarkable stay in Kolkata. I certainly look forward to returning in the future.

Title: A Regal Retreat: Experiencing Opulence at ITC Royal Kolkata

Nestled in the heart of the vibrant city of Kolkata, the ITC Royal is truly a beacon of luxury and elegance. From the moment you step into its grand lobby, you're enveloped in a world of sophistication and charm that sets the tone for an unforgettable stay.

The architecture is a seamless blend of traditional Indian motifs and contemporary design, exuding an air of regality that is hard to match. The attention to detail is evident in every corner, from the ornate furnishings to the exquisite artwork adorning the walls.

The rooms at ITC Royal are nothing short of spectacular. Spacious, well-appointed, and equipped with all modern amenities, they offer a sanctuary of comfort and tranquility amidst the bustling cityscape outside. The plush bedding ensures a restful night's sleep, while the luxurious bath amenities add an extra touch of indulgence.

Dining at ITC Royal is a gastronomic delight. With a range of restaurants offering diverse cuisines, there's something to tantalize every palate. Whether you're in the mood for authentic Indian fare, delectable international dishes, or innovative fusion cuisine, the talented chefs here never fail to impress.

The service at ITC Royal is impeccable, with staff going above and beyond to ensure every guest's needs are met with a smile. From the warm welcome at check-in to the prompt room service and attentive assistance throughout your stay, you're made to feel like royalty from start to finish.

One of the highlights of staying at ITC Royal is the wellness facilities. The state-of-the-art gym, rejuvenating spa, and serene pool area provide the perfect opportunity to unwind and recharge after a day of exploring the city.

Overall, my experience at ITC Royal Kolkata was nothing short of exceptional. From the luxurious accommodations to the top-notch service and amenities, every aspect exceeded my expectations. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, ITC Royal offers a truly unforgettable five-star experience that is second to none. I can't wait to return and indulge in its splendor once again.

The Park Hotel in Kolkata is a luxurious and contemporary establishment that offers a premium hospitality experience. As a guest at this renowned hotel, I was impressed by its sophisticated ambiance, impeccable service, and a range of amenities that catered to both business and leisure travelers.

The first thing that strikes you about The Park Hotel is its stylish and modern design. The hotel's architecture and interiors blend seamlessly, creating an elegant and inviting atmosphere. The attention to detail in the décor, furnishings, and lighting adds a touch of luxury to every corner of the property.

The rooms at The Park Hotel are spacious, well-appointed, and equipped with modern amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. The plush bedding, sleek furniture, and thoughtfully curated artwork create a chic and relaxing environment. The rooms are also equipped with high-speed internet connectivity, flat-screen televisions, and well-stocked minibars, providing all the necessary conveniences for a pleasant stay.

The hotel boasts a range of dining options that cater to diverse tastes. From fine dining restaurants offering gourmet cuisine to trendy bars and lounges serving creative cocktails and a vibrant nightlife experience, The Park Hotel has something to suit every palate. The culinary offerings are a true highlight, featuring a blend of international flavors and local delicacies that showcase the city's culinary heritage.

The Park Hotel is also well-equipped to host various events and conferences. With its spacious banquet halls, state-of-the-art audiovisual facilities, and professional event planning services, the hotel provides a seamless experience for both business meetings and social gatherings.

Beyond the amenities and services, the hotel staff at The Park Hotel deserves special mention. The team is attentive, courteous, and goes above and beyond to ensure that guests have a memorable stay. From the warm welcome at check-in to the prompt room service and assistance with any inquiries or requests, the staff's professionalism and dedication are evident throughout.

The hotel's central location in Kolkata makes it convenient for exploring the city's attractions, shopping districts, and business hubs. Additionally, The Park Hotel offers amenities such as a fitness center, a spa, and a swimming pool, providing opportunities for relaxation and rejuvenation during the stay.

In conclusion, The Park Hotel in Kolkata is a luxurious destination that offers a blend of contemporary elegance, impeccable service, and a range of amenities for a memorable stay. Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, the hotel's stylish interiors, excellent dining options, and attentive staff ensure a delightful experience. The Park Hotel stands as a testament to the city's hospitality and provides a haven of comfort and sophistication in the heart of Kolkata.

A Historic Gem in the Heart of Kolkata ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

My recent stay at The Lalit Great Eastern Kolkata transported me to an era of classic elegance and refined hospitality. This heritage property masterfully blends its historic charm with modern luxury, creating a truly surreal experience during my visit in early February.
The hotel's ambience immediately draws you in – the thoughtfully curated artifacts and warm, sophisticated lighting create an atmosphere that's both grand and welcoming. Every corner tells a story of the building's rich history while maintaining contemporary comfort.
What truly sets this property apart is its exceptional staff. Their polite demeanor and attentive service enhance the overall experience, making you feel valued throughout your stay. The breakfast spread deserves special mention—a delightful assortment of choices that caters to diverse palates and preferences.
The Lalit Great Eastern isn't just a hotel; it's a glimpse into Kolkata's colonial past wrapped in modern luxury. This gem of a property has certainly earned its reputation as one of the city's finest hotels. I'm already looking forward to my next visit to relive this enchanting experience.

A Remarkable Experience at The Lalit Great Eastern, Kolkata

Rating: ★★★★★

I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Lalit Great Eastern in Kolkata, and I must say it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. As one of the oldest and most iconic hotels in the city, the hotel seamlessly blends historical charm with modern amenities, creating an ambiance that is both elegant and inviting.

The rooms at The Lalit Great Eastern are a true testament to luxury. Spacious, tastefully decorated, and equipped with all the amenities one could ask for, they provide a comfortable and relaxing environment. The beds are incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep, and the cleanliness of the rooms is impeccable. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, the rooms at this hotel will exceed your expectations.

One of the standout aspects of The Lalit Great Eastern is the exemplary behavior of the staff. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm smiles and genuine hospitality. The staff members are professional, attentive, and always willing to go the extra mile to ensure a pleasant stay. They are knowledgeable about the hotel's facilities and services, and readily available to assist with any inquiries or requests. The level of personalized service truly made me feel like a valued guest.

Speaking of service, The Lalit Great Eastern is committed to delivering an exceptional experience in every aspect. The dining options are superb, offering a range of delectable cuisines to suit every palate. The hotel's restaurants are not only known for their mouthwatering dishes but also for their exquisite ambiance and attentive service. Additionally, the room service is prompt and efficient, and the staff pays great attention to detail to ensure that every need is met.

The location of The Lalit Great Eastern is another advantage. Situated in the heart of Kolkata, it provides convenient access to major attractions, shopping districts, and business centers. Whether you want to explore the historical landmarks or experience the vibrant culture of the city, you'll find everything within close proximity. Furthermore, the hotel's proximity to transportation hubs makes it easily accessible for both local and international travelers.

In conclusion, my stay at The Lalit Great Eastern was truly remarkable. The luxurious rooms, the impeccable service, the friendly and professional staff, and the convenient location all contributed to an unforgettable experience. Whether you're visiting Kolkata for business or pleasure, I highly recommend this hotel for a truly exceptional stay.

text.text:
Raajkutir, an oasis in the urban jungle of Kolkata

Raajkutir, a boutique 5 star hotel by IHCL SelecQtions, which offers a truly nostalgic Zamindaar Bari ambiance complete with its inspired period architecture and luxurious decor reminiscent of 18th century Bengal. We booked the property directly for anniversary purpose. Booking process was very smooth and reservation desk was very helpful to understand our requirements. When we reached the property, they welcomed us with Aarti and chandan tika, with traditional ‘Batasa’ , believed to be auspicious in Bengali culture. They escorted us to our room, narrating the history of the property… the untold story of Raja Kaliprasanna Singha. The room was very beautifully decorated with balloons, towel art and flowers. It had the true essence of zamindaari gharana… our room was premium category with balcony, equipped with all modern facilities and ethnic furniture. They organise traditional cultural folk music and dance every evening with serving of tea and jhalmuri. The property has a vast courtyard, many sweet points for photo shoots with loved ones. They also organised a special dinner for us… the thali was just extensive and mind blowing. The chef Mr. Biswarup Pramanik was very courteous and leaved no room for his guests to become unhappy.  The property also has a full functional Jiva spa, swimming pool, cafe and fitness centre. Overall it was a fantastic urban staycation and memorable experience with loved ones at weekend. Their hospitality really made our special day a memorable one.

text.text: My dear friends got married at this location. The Elgin Fairlawn is located near Park Street in the heart of South Kolkata. It's a heritage property that boasts of its beautiful guests who have been through the halls since 1973. It is a truly special experience staying at this property, especially if you choose the room with the smoking area. Else you can smoke all over the property wherever you spot an ashtray. text.text:
The hotel is situated in a fantastic location, surrounded by serene roads perfect for leisurely walks. It's in a posh area, with amenities like the court and SBI office just around the corner. What's more, within a stone's throw away, you can enjoy a boat ride across the Hooghly River, with ticket counters conveniently nearby.

The top restaurant offers a peaceful evening with a scenic water view, and the food served is not only delicious but also adds to the delightful experience. The unique touch of all the waiters dressed like sailors and the manager in a captain's attire, along with ship-themed decor, creates an immersive ambiance.

Connected to the main hotel by a mini-bridge over a trench surrounded by water, the hotel offers stunning views from every angle, even from the comfort of your room. If you prefer a balcony, they can accommodate that too, allowing you to soak in the picturesque surroundings.

With both food and liquor served, guests can enjoy a complete dining experience. Plus, the hotel's proximity to iconic landmarks like Victoria Memorial and cathedrals makes it an ideal base for exploring the city.

The hotel's own lawn space for parking, complete with a railway line crossing nearby, adds to the unique charm of the place. Whether you're looking for relaxation, adventure, or both, this hotel offers an unforgettable experience in every way.

The HHI Kolkata hotel is a luxury hotel located in the city of Kolkata, India. The hotel has 184 rooms and suites, and it offers various amenities such as a swimming pool, fitness center, spa, and multiple dining options. The hotel also has banquet and conference facilities, making it suitable for business meetings and events.

Online reviews of the HHI Kolkata hotel are generally positive. Guests praise the hotel's luxurious amenities, comfortable rooms, and helpful staff. Many guests also appreciate the hotel's location, which is in a convenient area of Kolkata.

text.text:
Hotel Hindustan International (HHI) is a renowned hotel that offers a delightful experience to its guests. From the moment you step into the hotel, you are greeted with warm hospitality and impeccable service.

The rooms at HHI are spacious, well-appointed, and comfortable, ensuring a pleasant stay. The staff goes above and beyond to cater to your needs and make you feel at home. Whether it's arranging transportation, providing local recommendations, or addressing any concerns, their attentiveness is commendable.

One of the highlights of HHI is its culinary offerings. The hotel boasts a variety of restaurants and dining options that cater to diverse tastes. From authentic local cuisine to international delicacies, you'll find a range of delectable dishes to satisfy your palate.

Furthermore, HHI provides excellent amenities such as a well-equipped fitness center, a relaxing spa, and a refreshing swimming pool. These facilities allow guests to unwind and rejuvenate after a long day of exploring or business meetings.

The location of HHI is another advantage. Situated in a convenient area, it offers easy access to popular attractions, shopping districts, and business centers. Whether you're a leisure traveler or a corporate guest, HHI's central location makes it a convenient choice.

Overall, Hotel Hindustan International (HHI) stands out for its outstanding service, comfortable accommodations, delectable dining options, and convenient location. It's a top choice for travelers seeking a memorable and enjoyable stay.

text.text: Had a fantastic stay at the Astor as a family of 4, of whom two were very young children. The hotel itself is a beautiful heritage property fitted with modern amenities while preserving the old world charm. The food is great. But the part that I loved the most was the service. In my travels around the world, this has been our best hospitality experience. The staff took wonderful care of us. Tripti from the front desk helped us right size our booking 24 hours before the check in (since we had mistakenly overbooked the number of rooms), allocated a very suitable suite for us with some extra space that the kids could use, ensured that my wife’s food preferences (non gluten) were taken care of, checked on us frequently to ensure everything was in place. The housekeeping team led by Anirban was fantastic and even took extra care to provide air purifiers and adjusted the throbbing bass from the club downstairs so that we could rest very comfortably with solid soundproofing. The restaurant team ensured that we were fully taken care of. I have absolutely no complaints and we left very grateful and satisfied with our stay. Thank you again Tripti, Anirban and team! We will be back.

text.text:
We stayed for three nights at this wonderful hotel. We loved the location, as it is close to the Maidan district and New Market. On our first evening, we had dinner and drinks at the Deck 88 bar—the Smoked Negroni cocktail was delicious. The food is fairly simple. Another night, we dined at the hotel's restaurant, Kebab-E-Que, where the food was excellent, especially their chicken kebab.

The breakfast buffet offers a wide variety of sweet and savory options, and their pancakes are delicious! We booked the Exclusive Room, which was perfect—spacious and spotlessly clean. Housekeeping is available daily if requested.

The staff is friendly and professional. We would gladly return to this charming hotel with its ideal location!

text.text:
ANSHUMAN THAKKAR
STAY ON 6TH NOV 2024 AND SAME DAY CHECKOUT
Bad Experience: Astor Hotel in Bad Gastein, NO LIFT IN HOTEL 4 STAR CALGARY ONLY 1 ROOM IN GROUND FLOOR.
MUST BE NOT FOR FAMILY AND SENIOR CITIZEN.

I recently stayed at the Astor Hotel in Bad Gastein, Austria, and had a mixed experience. While the hotel's location is good.

The room itself was nice, clean, and comfortable, with a cozy atmosphere. However, the real letdown was the staff's behavior. Unfortunately, the staff were rude, unfriendly, and seemed completely uninterested in providing even the most basic level of customer service.

It's a shame, because with a bit more attention to customer service, the Astor Hotel could be a real gem.

Rating Breakdown:

- Cleanliness: 4/5
- Comfort: 4/5
- Facilities: 0/5 (no lift)
- Location: 5/5
- Service: 0/5
- Value: 1/5

I hope the hotel management takes steps to address the staff's behavior and improve the overall guest experience.
