Over the course of my two-night stay at Kennelworth Kolkata, I discovered the hotel's advantageous proximity to Park Street. The lobby, an initial focal point, left a positive impression with its pleasing aesthetics, and the check-in process proved to be both easy and efficient.

Upon entering the room, it became evident that it leaned towards the smaller side, but this was compensated by the commendable housekeeping service that maintained a consistent level of cleanliness and order. The buffet breakfast experience was a highlight, offering a satisfying array of options.

One noteworthy aspect was the staff's friendly and helpful attitude, adding a welcoming touch to the overall stay. However, what truly set the experience apart was the transformation upon stepping outside into the restaurant area. The presence of a captivating lawn and thoughtfully arranged outdoor seating created an ambiance that transported guests to a different world—a testament to the hotel's attention to detail and commitment to providing a delightful experience. All in all, Kennelworth Kolkata left a positive impression with its combination of efficient service, inviting atmosphere, and aesthetic appeal.

text.text:
I am thrilled to share my complete satisfaction with my recent stay at Kenilworth Hotel Kolkata. My wife and I had the pleasure of spending six nights at this exceptional establishment, and I cannot express enough how impressed we were with the incredible hospitality displayed by the entire hotel staff, including the security guards.

From the moment we arrived, we were greeted with warm smiles and a genuine willingness to make our stay as comfortable as possible. It was truly heartwarming to witness the dedication and care exhibited by the entire team throughout our time at the hotel.

One aspect that particularly amazed us was the attention to detail in maintaining cleanliness. We were astonished to find that the bed linen was changed every day, and our rooms were thoroughly cleaned. This level of diligence and commitment to providing a pristine environment truly exceeded our expectations.

The dining experience at Kenilworth Hotel Kolkata was nothing short of superb. We were delighted to discover that the hotel staff was more than willing to go beyond their listed menu to cater to our preferences. It was evident that they took pride in ensuring that each guest had an unforgettable dining experience. The smiling faces and genuine care from the staff made us feel like valued guests throughout our meals. Their level of care and hospitality truly elevated the hotel's status to more than a five-star establishment in our eyes.

During our check-out process, we experienced one of the fastest and smoothest procedures we have encountered. The efficiency with which the staff handled both our check-in and check-out was impressive. It left us with a sense of ease and convenience, further enhancing our overall experience.

Another noteworthy aspect of our stay was the range of pillow options available to us. The hotel's attention to providing personalized comfort was evident in this regard. The combination of a comfortable bed, plush pillows, and a peaceful ambiance made for a truly restful sleep.

Our stay at Kenilworth
Hotel Kolkata ranks among the best we have ever experienced, and we wholeheartedly recommend it to others seeking an exceptional stay in the city. The warm and welcoming environment, coupled with the staff's impeccable care and hospitality, made us feel at home away from home.

Almost every member of the staff took the time to ask if we would consider visiting again, and we can say with certainty that we will. The hotel's commitment to guest satisfaction is evident in every aspect of their service, and we look forward to returning to create more cherished memories in the future.

text.text:
My stay at Aauris Hotel on Park Street was nothing short of exceptional. Nestled in the vibrant heart of Kolkata, the hotel’s prime location offers effortless access to the city’s cultural and culinary delights, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers.

The rooms  were elegantly appointed, blending contemporary comfort with thoughtful touches that ensured a relaxing retreat after a day of exploration. Impeccably clean and well-maintained, they provided a serene haven amidst the city’s energy.

However, the true highlight was the dining experience. The hotel’s restaurant - Zyqa was outstanding, offering a delectable array of dishes that celebrated both local flavors and global cuisine. Each meal was a delight, crafted with precision and served with finesse. Equally impressive was the in-room dining —prompt, efficient, and consistently delicious.

What truly set Aauris apart was its staff. Tamal, Sanjib, and the entire team exemplified professionalism and warmth, attending to every request with genuine care and efficiency. Their hospitality elevated the experience, making me feel not just welcomed, but truly valued.

For those seeking a refined stay in Kolkata, Aauris Hotel delivers on every front—luxury, convenience, and impeccable service. I would eagerly return and highly recommend it to discerning travelers.

text.text:
We stayed at this hotel for a week and felt it was an absolute steal! I honestly don’t understand why this place doesn’t have better reviews—it truly deserves them! The check-in and checkout process was smooth, and the room was spotless, stocked with all the required essentials. The staff were incredibly courteous and always ready to help, promptly restocking items upon request.

The hotel features three excellent dining options: Scarlet (a cozy café/ bakery), Cobo (a rooftop Pan-Asian bar), and Zyqa (an Indian restaurant). We especially loved the in-room dining service from Zyqa—it was prompt, the food was consistently delicious, and their attention to detail (even including small items like toothpicks) reflected their commitment to guest satisfaction.

Another huge advantage of this hotel is its great location. It’s a short walk to Park Street, where you’ll find endless eateries, as well as Nature Study, a peaceful and well-maintained park. Most notably, the hotel is close to the US Consulate, making it the perfect choice if that’s your purpose for visiting.

The only challenge we experienced was the Internet, which was a bit slow for attending meetings or other high-data usage activities. However, it worked fine for basic phone usage.

Overall, we loved our stay here and wouldn’t hesitate to visit again! Thanks Team Aauris! :)

text.text:
Aauris Hotel on Park Street in Kolkata presents a balanced blend of affordability and comfort. The rooms, while not extravagant, exude a simplicity that contributes to a cozy atmosphere. The decor is tasteful, and amenities are sufficient for a comfortable stay.

The hotel's service is noteworthy, with staff displaying a friendly and responsive attitude. Their willingness to assist and address any concerns adds a positive dimension to the overall guest experience. While not overly indulgent, the service meets the expectations of a budget-friendly accommodation.

One of the standout features is the hotel's strategic location on Park Street. This puts guests in the heart of Kolkata's bustling cultural and commercial hub, offering easy access to popular attractions, dining options, and shopping avenues. The convenience of being centrally located is a significant advantage for travelers exploring the city.

Despite being a budget-friendly option, the hotel manages to maintain cleanliness and hygiene standards. The maintenance of facilities is commendable, ensuring a hassle-free stay for guests.

In conclusion, Aauris Hotel on Park Street, Kolkata, is a sensible choice for those seeking affordability without compromising on comfort. Its unpretentious yet welcoming ambiance, coupled with a prime location, makes it a solid option for travelers looking to explore the vibrant city of Kolkata without breaking the bank.

text.text:
There are a few wear and tear in the bathroom. The shower part floor tiles were broken and missing. The corners are filthy, I would suggest HARPIC RED to get rid of those unpleasant looking stains. The toilet seats are worn out, lost it's polish because of using harsh chemicals like HARPIC, I assume. The bathroom fittings like the shower and taps need to be replaced. The owner can replace them using 1 nights money EASILY.

The staff is very well behaved, 5 star for that. But they might need 1 star training in order to deserve a 5 star rating. Welcome drink was a surprise though.

The rooms are spacious without compromise, safe was there, mini refrigerator, silent AC, the ceiling fan was wobbling and very noisy at low speed Room#405

The hotel's restaurant is very very nice and the chef is simply the best, we did meet him and thanked him enough.

The breakfast was sooo good. Everything from fresh in house watermelon and pineapple and papaya juices, different types of cornflakes, sweets, pastries, cakes and cupcakes, jams, butter, coffee, tea, palm dates, dry fruits, fresh cut fruits, parathas, poor and idlis and poha and what not. The last time I visited Kolkata, I had stayed at the LALIT GREAT EASTERN but this KEMPTON beat it easily believe me, just miniature if compared but a champion. I'll definitely stay here once again.

The location is fantastic, landmark location. The ONLY major issue was the noise from neighboring buildings, the constant loud roar of Air Conditioner outdoor units chewed up our brains no exaggeration believe me.

PLEASE REPLACE THE BATHROOM FITTINGS and replace the floor tiles in the bathroom. before I come again :))))
